1.content:
John, Gabby, Chris, and Sarah all lived in a small town, with a population of only 20,000 or so, in the mountains where there was seriously nothing to do. the local economy was in shambles as most of the stores in the downtown area were boarded up, replaced by big box stores that employed a good portion of the lower class citizens. the rest worked in other small stores, farms, schools, clinics or if you were lucky in one of the few factories in the area. the best paying jobs, outside of management, where at the factories and as such they were held in high regard by the locals for employing so many of the citizens. of course you had your specialists doctors and mechanics and what not but they were but a handful.

the fact of the matter is, this town could not survive without the factories. that said, the economy was still very unstable and as such the town itself had very little money to spend on entertainment and recreation for the citizens. it just barely scrapped by maintaining the roads, schools and the small fire fighters and police force. this led to an increase in crime and vandalism by the youth, simply out of pure boredom as many were quoted as saying during their arrests and subsequent trials. there was nothing to do, so they found something to do, regardless if it was legal or not.

one such group of youth were a group of 4 young adults. barely out of high school, and not able to get into college, they had little hope for their future. though the drinking age was 21, it was unenforced for the most part. underage drinking was a huge problem in this town but nobody was willing to spend the tax payers money to put a stop to it. they figured that if anything it would help keep the citizens and especially the youth out of the way. one day, John and Gabby, a young couple along with another couple, Chris and Sarah, were down in Sarah's parent's basement getting drunk on a Saturday night. nothing unusual. they were bored to death and wanted a little adventure.

Gabby suggested they just stay there and smoke some weed -- a safe bet as they wouldn't leave the basement but how boring. Chris just wanted to have sex with Sarah but he wasn't going to make any moves while the others were there, so he kept quite on the matter. Sarah, probably the most mature of all of them, thought it'd be a good idea to simply go hiking in the woods. John and the rest quickly agreed...as it was something to do. It was the middle of the night when they went out. most of the town was asleep, even the factories were shut down as they didn't run 24 hours a day.

While hiking through the woods they came to a clearing where a brand new factory had just been built a little over a month ago. the building was massive and was the biggest factory in town. Sarah asked "does anyone know what they make here?" "nope!" said Gabby and Chris but Chris knew. "they make disposable diapers here. some new start up that got millions of dollars from investors to produce and test them here" said Chris. "how do you know that?!" asked Gabby. "I read it in the paper last month" said Chris. "apparently they got a bunch of the local mothers to volunteer their babies as testers and got free diapers in exchange." said Chris. "well that's kind of cool, those things can be expensive, at least I remember them being when my sister Rebbecca was born several years ago, we had to cut back on other things..." said Sarah.

"it doesn't look like anyone is there, let's check it out." Said John. "umm, I don't think that's a good idea" said Chris. "meh, it's something to do" said Gabby. "okay, let's do it." said Sarah. they jumped the small chain link fence surrounding the factory and made their way to the perimeter. there were several entrances -- The main one where the offices and test area where located, the factory entrance where the works would enter, the back dock were the trucks docked to transport loaded product and material and another entrance that was rather peculiar. they approached said area and it appeared to be a giant metal chute the size of a garbage truck that led to darkness. "better not go in that way." said John while pointing at a sign above that read "Cation: Diaper Recycling Processing Area" "ewwww...they recycle dirty diapers? that's gross!" said Sarah. "yeah, that's a big reason why this company had so much money from investors...apparently someone finally figured out a way to recycle and reuse disposable diapers." Said John.
in the end they decided to go in through the...
1.title: BORED!

11.content:
John and Gabby, a young couple along with another couple, Chris and Sarah,

The four walked around to another side of the building. Before them stood what appeared to be an entrance into the administrative side of the building. The facade caused the building to look more like a business and less like a factory. John grabbed the door handle and pushed the door open.

"That's strange," Gabby said, "This place looks deserted, yet the doors are unlocked."

"Doesn't matter," Chris laughed as he pushed past John.

The four entered the building and looked around. They found themselves standing inside of a spacious foyer. A reception desk sat ahead of them, abandoned. In the corner of the ceiling, unbeknownst to the intruders, a security camera spied on them.

Wandering around became dull quite quickly. There was nothing unusual about the factory. Clearly, the only reason that nobody was present was because everyone had taken the day off. Sarah's exasperated sighs echoed through the hallways until Chris had finally had enough.

"Fine, we'll leave!" Chris grumbled.

The four turned and started to walk towards the exit when they froze. Standing before them was a very stern looking woman in a business suit and three security guards. Her hair was tied back into a bun when streaks of gray running through. Her arms were crossed and she did not look happy.

"What do you think you're doing?" The woman demanded an answer. "You're trespassing on private property."

All four individuals began talking at once. Gabby tried to cry her way out of the situation, while John tried to explain things. Chris began to argue and Sarah attempted to bargain. None of their words could be understood though.

The woman held up her hand, effectively silencing them. Her authoritative manner caused them to all cease their yammering. They stared at the woman and the guards. The door was within sprinting distance if they all chose to run for it.

"I would like to make you an offer," The woman began. "An offer that I believe is quite fair. You are all trespassing, and I could have you all arrested. Instead, though I would like to offer you all jobs at my factory. It is apparent to me that your shenanigans are the direct result of you having too much free time."
11.title: Office and Testing Area Entrance

111.content:
"To hell with this," Chris shouted, "Run!"

Chris took off towards the exit. His three friends were stunned, but quickly knew what to do. All four sprinted towards the doors. Their freedom was insight.

The woman sighed as she reached into her jacket pocket and pulled out a remote control. She pressed a red button on the remote and a steel gate dropped from the ceiling in front of the door causing all four young adults to crash into each other.

"I was hoping that we could do this the easy way," The woman continued. "Tim and Frank, please apprehend the gentlemen. Robert, please watch the ladies."

The security guards followed the woman's orders without any hesitation. John and Chris soon found their hand bound behind their backs with zip ties. Sarah and Gabby stood off to the side, watching the ordeal. Both women were too scared to move.

Now that you have thoroughly tested my patience, my job offer is going to be much less amicable," The woman sneered. "We have several positions available in the nursery, as well as several positions available in our research and development wing. The choice is yours."

The two guards lifted John and Chris to their fight. Once the two men were able to walk, all four of the friends were escorted down the hallway. The hall was lined with doors, most likely offices to different executives.

Soon, the four friends found themselves inside of a nursery. It was as they expected; there were cribs, changing tables, rocking chairs, high chairs, and a mountain of children's toys. Like every nursery, there was a large stack of diapers.

"We will leave you here for now," Ms. Reid explained. "You will have plenty of work to do soon enough."

Without a further explanation, Ms. Reid turned and left the nursery. The two security guards cut the zip ties that bound John and Chris before they too exited and left the four friends alone in the nursery.

"Why did you choose to work in the nursery?" Chris asked, rubbing his wrists.

"It seemed like it would be easier than whatever creepy stuff they would have us do in the research and development," Gabby answered. "I think I was right, this doesn't seem bad. There aren't even any babies here."

"That's what worries me," Sarah said, surveying the room. "Does that stack of diapers over there look larger than normal?"

The four friends began to wander around the room. Each looked over a different aspect of the nursery. John was busy surveying the cribs. Each crib was decorated in white and pink; presumably, they were intended for baby girls. Chris uncomfortably eyed the high chairs. "Excellent!" The woman exclaimed. "My name is Ms. Reid. You will refer to me as Ms. Reid. If you do a satisfactory job then we will erase the security camera footage and will forget about your little transgression."

"So what job did we just agree to do?" Gabby asked.

"You wet yourself?" he asked, "come on kid, let's get you to Ms Reid so we can clean you up."
"It's me Chris! John!" Chris stopped what he was doing a looked at the kid blankly.
"Wait what?" Chris asked, this was too much confusion for first thing in the morning.
"That potion we drank, it must have done this," John reasoned. "I fell asleep and when I woke up we were younger and wet."
"We?" Chris asked, it was only then that he became aware of the damp patch around his own crotch. He jumped up and looked himself over, he looked slightly slimmer and not as muscular. He felt around his face and noticed the absence of of the golden stubble he usually had.

They both heard the door open and snapped their heads around to watch Ms Reid walk into the room, looking smug.

"While this may be a diaper factory we dabble in all things infantile," Ms Reid explained, "the business prides itself in its ingenuity. We conduct many experiments, one of which is the liquid you drank. There are many people who wish to be young again, this potion will reduce them to the age of 16 so that they have a little more time as a child."

11222.content:
John and Chris found themselves in front of four different doors. A guard stepped up to explain.

"This factor's products are based on our theory of the 4 Stages of Childhood. Each nursery corresponds to a different age range."

He points to the leftmost door. It's colored yellow.

"That nursery is for newborns, children under 3 months of age. We test our sensitive options-soft wipes, preemie sized diapers, etc."

He moves onto the next one, which is a light blue.

"That one is for infants, from 3-9 months. Here, babies are learning to explore their world and move-so we have diapers that are flexible and form-fitting. As they start to eat more complex foods, they also need thicker wipes."

The next door is a purplish color.

"Here, we have young toddlers-about 9 months to 18 months, or 1 1/2 year olds. With children getting their feet, it's no wonder that here we test diapers that are easy to change, like our Convertibles. We also have on-the-go wipes in travel packs."

The final door is red.

"And finally, we have older toddlers. It's sort of split in half-the half that's testing the bigger sizes of Convertibles and other young toddler products, and the potty trainers, who are testing our training pants, moist flushable wipes, and bathroom products like hand soap and washing mitts."

The guard then turns to them.

"Which nursery will you pick?"

15.content:
"This is dumb," Sarah whined. "We're going to get in trouble if we get caught breaking in."

"Fine," Chris grumbled. "The baby doesn't want to sneak into the baby factory."

"Let's at least explore around the property," John suggested, hoping to ease the tension.

The four wandered away from the factory. The grounds surrounding the property were quite forested. It was surprising how the trees managed to keep the factory hidden. A nearby trail could be seen leading away from the factory.

Chris took Sarah's hand after he saw John reach over and take a hold of Gabby's hand. The two couples began to walk down the trail. Their voices were muted and they enjoyed their natural surroundings. It did not take long before the trail to a small pool of water. Steam rose up from the water. Water entered the pool from a small pipe that was exposed. Above the pipe was a warning sign.

"Looks like this pipe is property of the factory," Gabby said as she pointed out the sign. "This must be from the runoff."

"I can't believe the water is so clear," Sarah exclaimed. "It looks warm, like a hot tub."

"We should get in!" Chris exclaimed, as he began to remove his clothes.

"What if the water is toxic?" John asked.

Deep down, John was anxious about stripping down in front of his friends. He had no qualms against swimming, but he was worried that he would be teased for wearing briefs instead of boxers.

"I doubt it's toxic. Look at all the plants that are growing nearby," Chris answered. "If you're afraid of the water then you don't have to get in."

"I'm not afraid," John huffed. "But what if the water scalds us? We don't know how hot hot the water is."

"Quit stalling, you big baby," Chris teased.

Chris had stripped down to his boxers and was preparing himself to get into the pool. Sarah had stripped as well, and was now donning just her bra and panties. Gabby had started to undress as well, but she had paused and was waiting for John to make up his mind.

"I'll get in if you get in," Gabby told John. "If you want me to sit out with you then I will."
15.title: The property

151.content:
"Fine, I'll get in," John sighed as he began to strip.

Once all four friends were down to nothing but their underwear they made their way into the water. The water was cooler than they had expected. While nothing like a hot tub, it was quite relaxing to wade around in. Chris leaped onto John and tried to dunk John under the water.

"What the hell?" John coughed as he pushed Chris off of him. "You could have drowned me! Worst yet, I swallowed some of the water! What if this stuff is toxic?"

Gabby intervened by swimming up to John. She grabbed his arm and they waded over towards a shallow end of the spring.

"I'll prove that this water isn't toxic," Chris sneered, before sticking his face underwater and sucking up a mouthful of water.

After swallowing, Chris said, "There, if you die then I die too."

Sarah stuck her mouth down to the water and took a big drink too. "I want to take part in this suicide pact as well!"

"You all are weirdos," Gabby laughed as she bent towards the water to take a drink too. "If everyone is going to be drinking toxic water then I might as well join you in the morgue."

The four friends quickly forgot their troubles and began to continue splashing in the water. Soon, an hour had passed and they were all getting tired. Gabby was the first to exit the pool, followed by John. Sarah left the water shortly after, but Chris had to wait until he calmed down.

"Ugh, I don't feel so good," John grumbled as he clutched his stomach. "I think the water is starting to affect me."

"Don't be ridiculous. You're just being a big," Sarah began to scold John before she too doubled over and clutched her stomach.

"Ooooh," Gabby moaned, as her stomach also began to ache.

"What's happening?" Chris screamed as he made his way out of the water.
151.title: John agrees, and all four enter the water

152.content:
"I'm going to sit out," John declared.

Gabby reluctantly put her clothes back on. She then joined John on a downed tree that served as a bench. The two watched Chris and Sarah splash each other in the water.

"The water is great," Chris yelled before he dunked Sarah.

Sarah came up to the surface sputtering. She coughed up a bunch of water before tackling Chris and dragging him underneath the water. The two continued to flirt with each other in the water as John and Gabby began to flirt with each other on land.

"What the hell is going on?" Chris shouted as he proceeded to swim towards the shore. "My body feels weird."

"Oh my God," Sarah screamed as she followed Chris to the shore.

Once ashore, Gabby and John watched in horror as Chris and Sarah began to shrink. Chris and Sarah's bodies twitched and constricted. With each passing second, the two appeared to grow younger and smaller.

When Chris and Sarah finally stopped screaming, they both appeared to be about the size of a one year old. Their faces had and bodies had reverted back through puberty and they looked no different from an average toddler.

"What do we do now?" Gabby asked in dismay as she stared at her two friends.

John scratched his head before replying,

info.description:
sometime in the future, you and some friends sneak into a diaper factory out of general curiousity. diapers are no longer only disposable as so called disposable diapers may now be recycled into new diapers or other products.

once you are in the factory, you are ambushed by the staff who shrink you down with a ray gun and do whatever they please with you. this may include treating you like babies and make you tests various diapers, put you on the diaper assembly line and actually make you a part of a diaper or even feed you to the other testers! you are allowed to leave the factory but it must involve diapers somehow.

the main characters may be no larger than toddler sized once they are shrunk. however they may be smaller as well...much smaller.

the main characters are as follows:
John - 21 year old male
Gabby - 18 yeard old female
Chris - 19 year old male
Sarah - 21 year old female
other characters may be any age that you please.

please be descriptie and write at least 2-3 paragraphs. that's 5-6 sentances per paragraph!
no death is allowed. even if a character is transformed into a diaper and eaten or whatever they are still alive and conscious.
